properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent of the BevelAndEmbossSetting (a TransparencySetting, StrokeTransparencySetting, FillTransparencySetting or ContentTransparencySetting).

properties.name: events
properties.description: A collection of events.

properties.name: eventListeners
properties.description: A collection of event listeners.

properties.name: applied
properties.description: If true, the bevel or emboss effect is applied.

properties.name: style
properties.description: The style of bevel or emboss.

properties.name: technique
properties.description: The edging technique of the bevel or emboss.

properties.name: depth
properties.description: The depth of the bevel or emboss (as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 1000)

properties.name: direction
properties.description: The direction of the bevel or emboss.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the bevel or emboss.

properties.name: soften
properties.description: The amount (in pixels) of softening.

properties.name: angle
properties.description: The angle of the light source. (Range: -180 to 180)

properties.name: altitude
properties.description: The altitude of the light source. (Range: 0 to 90)

properties.name: useGlobalLight
properties.description: If true, the global light source is used.

properties.name: highlightColor
properties.description: The color applied to the highlight portion of the effect, specified as a swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), a color library color, a hex value, or as an array of color values. The color mode dictates the array values: for RGB, specify three values, each in the range 0 to 255, in the format [R,G,B]; for CMYK, specify four values, each as a percentage and each in the range 0 to 100, in the format [C,M,Y,K]; for LAB, specify three values in the format [L,A,B], with L in the range 0 to 100 and A and B in the range -128 to 127; for HSB, specify three colors in the format [H,S,B], with H in the range 0 to 360 and S and B as percentages in the range 0 to 100.

properties.name: highlightBlendMode
properties.description: The blending mode for the highlight portion of the effect.

properties.name: highlightOpacity
properties.description: The opacity of the highlight portion of the effect (as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 100)

properties.name: shadowColor
properties.description: The color applied to the shadow portion of the effect, specified as a swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), a color library color, a hex value, or as an array of color values. The color mode dictates the array values: for RGB, specify three values, each in the range 0 to 255, in the format [R,G,B]; for CMYK, specify four values, each as a percentage and each in the range 0 to 100, in the format [C,M,Y,K]; for LAB, specify three values in the format [L,A,B], with L in the range 0 to 100 and A and B in the range -128 to 127; for HSB, specify three colors in the format [H,S,B], with H in the range 0 to 360 and S and B as percentages in the range 0 to 100.

properties.name: shadowBlendMode
properties.description: The blending mode for the shadow portion of the effect.

properties.name: shadowOpacity
properties.description: The opacity of the shadow portion of the effect (as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 100)

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the BevelAndEmbossSetting.

methods.name: getElements
methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
